issue.title: What did you developers do?
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/?ref=mygaysites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Quick reminder if you want me to stop making issue tickets than stop not responding anymore on the ones already made again I am paying for AdGuard so I don’t understand why I have to make multiple issue tickets just to get a response now with that out of the way 

Okay, so I’m gonna try this way you all seem to be having no issue Alex, BlazDT, Zolyden,yougotskinny, and Krystian watching multiple videos on gaypornhdfree.com with your AdGuard active so clearly the issue is not with Adguard than it’s either with my phone, my internet provider, internet protocol, or I just didn’t follow the steps exactly and or in the correct order 

So please thoroughly explain the step by step process and the order of the process you did to accomplish Adguard never being detected when trying to play videos on gaypornhdfree.com

if I can determine with your help that I have now with confirmation followed the steps to the letter that you all followed to accomplish this,

than I can check this one off and realize it’s an issue with my phone, internet provider, or my internet protocol, 

but I want know unless one of you explains thoroughly what you did of step by step and the order to make gaypornhdfree.com never detect AdGuard each time, 


So please respond as asap with the detailed instructions of what you did 
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> I do not have an ETA as I am not an iOS dev. Please check the link my colleague posted in other issue.

What link and which colleague?

issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.twitch.tv/exsl95](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fexsl95) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/V7hcBOU.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.11.3 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/windows/filters/15.txt, User+rules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List

Other:

Language-specific:

Icelandic ABP List,
Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard,
Polish Anti Adblock Filters,
Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters,
AdGuard French,
AdGuard Russian,
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js Referrer: | [https://www.twitch.tv/exsl95](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fexsl95) Other extensions used: | twitch sometimes get stuck / stream stops playing and the new "banner ads" make the stream small for some time. i could block them manually but all in all please look to make the twitch experience 100% good again and ad free

issue.title: Not getting updates/website detecting Adblocker every time now

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://gaypornhdfree.com/?ref=mygaysites

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
I have uninstalled and reinstalled the Adguard app multiple times could doing that interfere with getting updates? Or could that cause the base filter that Alex added a new code specifically for gaypornhdfree.com to no longer work? My iPhone is iPhone 7 Plus operating system 15.7.1 safari version 15.7.1

All I know is now if I click the updating button on the adguard app it saids no updates found. And the website is now detecting my adblocker every time no matter how many refreshes of the page I do. Could someone also please tell me what are the exact filters I must have enabled for in safari protection of the app in order for the added code Alex did to work? 

I have set up the six Adguard extensions on settings-safari of Aduard custom-Adguard general-Aduard other-Adguard privacy-Adguard security-Adguard-social 

each one is enabled 

I have gone to gaypornhdfree.com selected the aA icon on the left of the url bar of safari picked manage extensions and made sure adguard was enabled for advanced protection

I also clicked on adguard on the list shown when you click aA and checked to make sure safari protection specifically for that website is enabled

I have went also to setting-safari and selected

delete history and website data I have also selected close tabs afterwards 


I have added the user rule that Alex told me to add I have done everything I believe I was told of the exact order

but just in case could someone please direct me to the steps again of the exact order 

to make sure I have not missed a step or done it in the wrong order





2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

If someone could please respond of the exact order of the steps needed for this to work I could implement then immediately 


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> > @AdamWr `@zloyden` can you reproduce on that dood.re iframe page?
> 
> Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
> 
> If issue sometimes occurs and sometimes not, then I guess that it might be iOS/Safari related issue where some rules are applied too late and due to this don't work. For example, similar issue was here - [#108226 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/108226#issuecomment-1098870812) on every other platforms popups were blocked correctly, but on iOS (the same with Safari extension) sometimes were blocked, sometimes not, and it looks like iOS/Safari extensions issue.

Hello??????

comment.body:
> > If issue sometimes occurs and sometimes not, then I guess that it might be iOS/Safari related issue where some rules are applied too late and due to this don't work.
> > For example, similar issue was here - [#108226 (comment)](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/108226#issuecomment-1098870812) on every other platforms popups were blocked correctly, but on iOS (the same with Safari extension) sometimes were blocked, sometimes not, and it looks like iOS/Safari extensions issue.
> 
> I agree with that. Looks like it can be related to [AdguardTeam/SafariConverterLib#40](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/SafariConverterLib/issues/40) and we can only wait for the fix.

Hello?????
